name: Lugia
author: TOKIYA
flavor_text: It is said to be the guardian of the seas. It is rumored to have been seen on the night of a storm.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, any damage done by attacks from your opponent’s Active Pokémon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Intensifying Burn
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon is a Pokémon-EX, this attack does 60 more damage.
